title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Digital Twin-Based Mathematical Experiment Design and Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: One can design and simulate mathematical models in a digital twin environment.
One can define and solve mathematical optimization problems based on experimental data.
One can critically analyze the educational effectiveness of mathematics experiments utilizing digital twin technology.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
